attributes.action: appoint Jeremy Clarkson as the minister for transport
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I believe Jeremy Clarkson the BBC Top Gear presenter along with his vast knowledge of motoring and publicy supported transport initiatives would make an ideal candidate for the Minister of Transport. His expertise would go a long way to solving recent congestion issues and therefore would make a Britains transport network the envy of the world.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "appoint Jeremy Clarkson as the minister for transport."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page13955.asp

Prime Minister's Office
